text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, sadaqahoi xudro ʙo minnatu ozor ʙotil nakuned, hamcun kase, ki moli xudro ʙaroi namois dodan ʙa mardum infoq mekunad va ʙa Allohu ruzi qijomat imon nadorad; pas, masali u hamcun masali sangi sofest, ki ruji on [andake] xok nisastaast; on goh ʙoroni tunde ʙar on mezanad [va hamai xokhoro az sang mesujad] va onro sof [-u ʙiduni xok] raho mekunad. Onon [rijokoron] az on ci, ki ancom dodaand, cize ʙa dast nameovarand; va Alloh taolo guruhi kofironro hidojat namekunad
